title: Collaborative Cloud-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project for Integrated Reading-Writing Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing strengthening competencies in analyzing practical documents and writing reports based on mathematics curriculum, integrating academic writing and problem-solving skills through team collaboration using cloud tools

learning_goals: Learners will summarize and integrate materials from diverse sources with ≥85% accuracy during mathematical problem-solving processes.
Learners will collaborate with team members using cloud-based tools to draft math reports and incorporate ≥3 rounds of feedback.
Learners will complete a 5-page logical report applying mathematical concepts through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
